meanings.definition: A leader or ruler in a monastery
meanings.sent1: The hegumenes guided the monks in their daily prayers.
meanings.sent2: The hegumenes oversaw the construction of the new chapel.
meanings.sent3: The hegumenes jokingly challenged the monks to a race around the monastery.
meanings.sent4: His wisdom and guidance made him the hegumenes of their community.
meanings.sent5: The hegumenes' presence in the monastery was as comforting as a warm hearth on a cold night.

meanings.definition: The head of a religious community
meanings.sent1: As the hegumenes, he made important decisions for the monastery.
meanings.sent2: The hegumenes welcomed new members to the religious community.
meanings.sent3: During the festival, the hegumenes led the community in joyful songs.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness and compassion earned her the title of hegumenes.
meanings.sent5: The hegumenes' influence on the religious community was as profound as the roots of an ancient tree.

meanings.definition: A person in authority or control
meanings.sent1: The hegumenes of the village settled disputes among the residents.
meanings.sent2: As the hegumenes, she ensured harmony within the community.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous children tried to play a prank on the hegumenes.
meanings.sent4: His fair and just leadership style made him a respected hegumenes.
meanings.sent5: The hegumenes' power over the village was as unyielding as a mountain standing tall against the winds.
